ai-tika-vin05t19:12_4: The wise Theravāda Collection of the Disciple, a Vinaya, it seems, did the Vinaya.
ai-tika-vin05t19:12_5: He saw a pot full of ghee and asked, “Venerable sir, what have you seen? ”
ai-tika-vin05t19:12_6: The senior monks said, “Piṇḍola Bhāradvāja, eating rice and suitable food, and meat to eat ghee.”
ai-tika-vin05t19:12_7: The Elder Tissa said, “Sir, it is not allowable.”
ai-tika-vin05t19:12_8: and the Elder laid down on the front in his mouth.
ai-tika-vin05t19:12_9: The senior elder asked him one day, and he said, “After seeing him lying down,” but rather he replied, “It is not allowable to take a place where there.”
